Q1.title: I feel a sincere desire for the eternal welfare and happiness of other people.

Q10.title: I find joy in others’ achievements.

Q2.title: When I pray, I ask for charity—the pure love of Christ.

Q3.title: I try to understand others’ feelings and see their point of view.

Q4.title: I forgive others who have offended or wronged me.

Q5.title: I try to help others when they are struggling or discouraged.

Q6.title: When appropriate, I tell others that I love them and care about them.

Q7.title: I look for opportunities to serve other people.

Q8.title: I say positive things about others.

Q9.title: I am kind and patient with others, even when they are hard to get along with.

Q1.title: I work effectively, even when I’m not under pressure or close supervision.

Q2.title: I focus my efforts on the most important things.

Q3.title: I have a personal prayer at least twice a day.

Q4.title: I focus my thoughts on my calling as a missionary.

Q5.title: I set goals and plan regularly.

Q6.title: I work hard until the job is completed successfully.

Q7.title: I find joy and satisfaction in my work.

Q1.title: I believe in Christ and accept Him as my Savior.

Q2.title: I feel confident that God loves me.

Q3.title: I trust the Savior enough to accept His will and do whatever He asks.

Q4.title: I firmly believe that through the Atonement of Jesus Christ I can be forgiven of all my sins.

Q5.title: I have enough faith in Christ to obtain answers to my prayers.

Q6.title: I think about the Savior during the day and remember what He has done for me.

Q7.title: I have the faith necessary to help make good things happen in my life or the lives of others.

Q8.title: I know by the power of the Holy Ghost that the Book of Mormon is true.

Q9.title: I have enough faith in Christ to accomplish anything He wants me to do—even miracles if necessary.

Q1.title: One of my greatest desires is to inherit eternal life in the celestial kingdom of God.

Q2.title: I am confident that I will have a happy and successful [life].

Q3.title: I feel peaceful and optimistic about the future.

Q4.title: I firmly believe that someday I will dwell with God and become like Him.

Q1.title: I am meek and lowly in heart.

Q2.title: I rely on the Lord for help.

Q3.title: I am sincerely grateful for the blessings I have received from the Lord.

Q4.title: My prayers are earnest and sincere.

Q5.title: I appreciate direction from my leaders or teachers.

Q6.title: I strive to be submissive to the Lord’s will, whatever it may be.

Q1.title: I feel confident in my understanding of gospel doctrines and principles.

Q3.title: I earnestly seek to understand the truth and find answers to my questions.

Q4.title: I receive knowledge and guidance through the Spirit.

Q5.title: I love and cherish the doctrines and principles of the gospel.

Q1.title: When I pray, I ask for strength to resist temptation and to do what is right.

Q2.title: I keep the required commandments to be worthy of a temple recommend.

Q3.title: I willingly obey the mission rules and follow the counsel of my leaders.

Q4.title: I strive to live in accordance with the laws and principles of the gospel.

Q1.title: I wait patiently for the blessings and promises of the Lord to be fulfilled.

Q2.title: I am able to wait for things without getting upset or frustrated.

Q3.title: I am patient and long-suffering with the challenges of being a missionary.

Q4.title: I am patient with the faults and weaknesses of others.

Q5.title: I am patient with myself and rely on the Lord as I work to overcome my weaknesses.

Q6.title: I face adversity and afflictions calmly and hopefully.

Q1.title: I am clean and pure in heart.

Q2.title: I have no desire to do evil but to do good.

Q3.title: I am dependable—I do what I say I will do.

Q4.title: I focus on righteous, uplifting thoughts and put unwholesome thoughts out of my mind.

Q5.title: I repent of my sins and strive to overcome my weaknesses.

Q6.title: I feel the influence of the Holy Ghost in my life.
